channel.title: Voice on Voyager Internet Ltd.
channel.description: Recent content in Voice on Voyager Internet Ltd.

item.title: Which smart speakers work best in NZ?
item.description: Currently the Google Nest Mini is widely considered the most capable and functional entry level smart speaker officially available in New Zealand.

item.title: How to call Australia from New Zealand
item.description: While phoning international numbers is second nature to many of us, it can be a confusing process to those who have rarely phoned overseas before.

item.title: Gaming lounge powers up business with Voyager fibre broadband
item.description: Kiwi business owner Callum Jennings is encouraging more New Zealand businesses to make the switch to fibre broadband after experiencing a “monumental increase in speed, significantly lower latency, and greater connection stability” at his own gaming lounge in Auckland.

item.title: Is the end nigh for copper phone lines? Don’t lose your voice – consider VoIP for business
item.description: With the successful rollout of Ultra Fast Broadband (UFB) across the country, fibre is becoming accessible to more and more New Zealanders.

item.title: Fibre broadband for business - differences and advantages over DSL
item.description: New Zealand has some of the fastest broadband in the world, as indicated by a 2019 study.
